item.description:
Let's meet at 8:30, enjoy the buffet, and disco!!

From  Vincent's webpage:

 Thursday's Ladies are free.     

Dress to impress, meet other adults over 30 who enjoy dancing and dining.

For more than 15 years Greater Boston singles and couples of all ages have danced, found romance, and made lasting friendships at Vincent's.

Ladies Night Dance Party Every Thursday Night Hosted by DJ Steve playing the best in Disco and Club Classics! Meet people make friends- Right Now. Face to Face....Here at Vincent's. EVERY THURSDAY NIGHT. Vincent's Nightclub created the adult singles party and now the all new ladies night.  Dance with your partner or with someone new. Meet in person at Boston's Premier Nightclub. Enjoy our lavish buffet, fantastic music and the very best atmosphere to enjoy your friends and mates.  The cover charge is $5.00 before 9 PM and $7.00 after 9 PM. LADIES ARE FREE ALL NIGHT LONG. We have a relaxed dress code on Thursdays. Jeans are allowed for women and men. Sneakers, flip flops, men's shorts and tank tops are not part of our relaxed dress code.    Doors Open 8:00 pm.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Ladies Night at Vincent's Nightclub
